programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Inheritors

Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Cheryl discovers her daughter Lauren is missing. Despite Cheryl's efforts to seek help from authorities and the media, her pleas are overshadowed by the attention given to the missing white girl's case.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to make her version of Mexican flautas using rotisserie chicken, green chillis and a blend of three cheeses, all rolled up and fried in tortillas.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael cooks a flavourful Mexican-style dish of halibut fish tacos along with pico de gallo, while John serves up a tall glass of refreshing watermelon margaritas.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: John is heading out on tour with his band, and to send him off Rachael whips up one of his favourite meals: seafood fra diavolo, a combination of shellfish and pasta tossed with a tomato-based sauce.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Barakan Discovers YONEZAWA
programme.desc: Admired by John F. Kennedy, Uesugi Yozan transformed the fortunes of the struggling Yonezawa Domain. Peter Barakan visits Yonezawa, once called "an Asiatic Arcadia," to explore Yozan's legacy.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-22.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at kotatsu: traditional heated tables.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: On this unique trip around Japan, discover the lesser-known charms and customs of regions through the eyes of cats! Filmed by wildlife photographe,Iwago Mitsuaki.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: This time, we ride through Hokkaido in autumn. Along the way, we see the animals in its majestic landscape, and meet the indigenous Ainu, who have long lived in harmony with nature.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Listen to the Earth
programme.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Freiburg im Breisgau is a city in southwestern Germany commonly known as "Freiburg". In recent years, it has gained recognition as one of Germany's most environmentally friendly cities.

programme.desc: Students in past editions of Easy Japanese for Work return for a quiz-style business Japanese lesson. This time, the students are Tran Than Tuan (from Vietnam) and Warni Letty Yuhara (from Indonesia).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes to extreme lengths to trick Gary into going to the vet. // SpongeBob become desperate when he accidentally gets pinned under his exercise equipment and must wait for help to arrive.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steve's bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Bose's Mom, Celia, picks up Schwoz's lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Piper's basketball coach quits, Henry becomes the coach of Piper's team. As he tries to whip the team into shape, he is challenged by the League Board and its unorthodox rules.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and they're not alone... there's a monster down there with them!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: Dora and the Search For Sol Dorado
programme.desc: Dora, Diego, and Boots join Naiya and Sonny on an adventure to find Sol Dorado, an Incan treasure. They will have to navigate the harsh jungle, complex puzzles, ancient booby traps, and test their fortitude to keep Sol Dorado out of enemy hands.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When their secret identities gets out, Danger Force will stop at nothing to prevent their parents from finding out who is behind their masks.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Piper's school Parrot, Otto, starts to repeat "Henry is Kid Danger". Henry and Jasper have to stall until Ray, Charlotte, and Schwoz can find a way to fix things.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde find themselves outmatched in the ultimate prank war, meanwhile Lisa takes on a new "sport" with some help from Lynn Jr.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes the main character from her favorite graphic novel into the real world. // Hazel befriends a sentient dumpster named Danky after learning about humans' harmful effects on the environment.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants at the annual Founder's Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip. // Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe transform into them to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When a mysterious new barber attacks Swellview with a string of terrible haircuts, it's up to Danger Force to uncover their identity before their own hair gets chopped

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family's pet toilet Tinkle has eleven toilet puppies. // Mistaking it for the local park, the Star family splits up at a cemetery to enjoy their favorite picnic activities.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton needs help stealing the formula, so he hires an intern who knows more about Mr. Krabs than anyone. // Patrick goes into a destructive fit whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Perch fights for his job after he's fired and replaced by a robot anchorman. // SpongeBob, Patrick, and Squidward feel the heat when they become volunteer firefighters.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottom—whether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: Game Shakers

programme.title: 100 Things To Do Before High School

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover

programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot (S3)
programme.desc: Russell uses an unlikely ally to pursue a strange predator. Meanwhile, while Bryce investigates the team's recent run-ins with mysterious floating orbs.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped (S1)
programme.desc: Ramy Romany runs down leads to find out why these children trekked more than 1,000 miles to their tragic demise.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters (S5)
programme.desc: The AIMS team sets out in the darkness to suss out the source of a monstrous roar that shook the hills and hollers of the Tygart Valley.

programme.title: Living Alaska (S5)
programme.desc: When a job opportunity opened in Kodiak, a Coast Guard family and their dogs jumped at the chance for a fresh start.

programme.title: Living Alaska (S5)
programme.desc: A couple decides to leave Seattle and put down roots in south Anchorage, Alaska.

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror (S2)
programme.desc: After going over the results from Sapphire's ghost box session, the team meets with Karen and reveals everything they know about the evil they've encountered.

programme.title: Ghost Brothers (S2)
programme.desc: The Ghost Brothers travel to Cleveland, Ohio to investigate a former funeral home.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters (S1)
programme.desc: Recently disclosed audio recordings and astonishing photographs provide the most conclusive evidence to date.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks (S2)
programme.desc: In Hawaii, the locals reveal what Waikiki has to offer, from surfing to swimming with sharks. And, adventurers go cliff-diving in Boracay, Philippines.

programme.title: Bikinis & Boardwalks (S2)

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nuï. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Fatou and Laeti argue. When she meets Api, Fatou confides that she too is starting to suspect Laeti. Api then decides to inform eric and Mouss.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: It's the last day of school. Vic, Felix and Flavie are busy preparing for the school prom. But everything seems less rosy when they discover that they're going to move home.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: La Vie A Velo
programme.desc: BMX has been around for a long time, but it particularly thrilled spectators at the Paris 2024 Olympics. Marion Rousse meets those who practice this sport, seeking its thrill, in the heart of the city.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: After working in several countries in Africa, it is finally in Ivory Coast that Patricia Ekaba puts down her suitcases. Director of communication but also a novelist, she is passionate about architecture, fashion, design and Nollywoodian cinema. She makes Adrien discover a face sometimes unknown on his continent.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Secrets D'Histoire
programme.desc: In the 18th century, destinies were forged by the complex interplay of diplomacy. Pauline Bonaparte remained committed and untameable. Her marriage to Prince Borghese, heir to an influential family, made her life exciting with her own role to play and authority to exercise.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Wildlive Expeditions Sauvages
programme.desc: The naturalist Remi Dupouy's team are in Cote d'ivoire. We explore the coastline in search of the sacred mangrove species and observe, along the Bandama River, the tense situation between hippos and humans. To the south-west, the expedition heads into the tropical rain forest, in search of the last-remaining elephants.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the candidates will be going head-to-head to see who produces the best three course meal using ingredients from the different regions of Quebec: a lobster starter, a lamb main dish and a blueberry gratin.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites
programme.desc: Reves is an association that makes dreams come true for seriously ill children. With Norbert Tarayre, Nathalie Simon, Jean-Pierre Castaldi, Isabelle Morini-Bosc, Alexia Laroche-Joubert, Frederick Bousquet.

programme.title: L'amour D'une Femme
programme.desc: Marie Prieur, a young doctor, takes up a post on Ouessant Island. Quickly adopted by the inhabitants, she becomes friends with the school teacher. When she falls in love with a young engineer, Andre Lorenzi, he quickly makes it clear that she must choose between marriage and her profession.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Planete Rap
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort !
programme.desc: With Norbert Tarayre, Nathalie Simon, Jean-Pierre Castaldi, Isabelle Morini-Bosc, Alexia Laroche-Joubert, Frederick Bousquet, for the Reves association.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C'est Moi... Marlene Jobert
programme.desc: Veritable icon for a generation, Marlene Jobert played in innumerable films during her long and prestigious career, alternating popular comedies and social dramas. In the 1960s she launched her career in theatre and television, before becoming one of the most popular actresses in French cinema.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Ordalies, Le Tribunal De L'invisible
programme.desc: In a tribal court in Brazzaville, the judges go to great lengths to reconcile families torn apart by accusations of black magic. At the heart of this unique form of justice: a world governed by spirits, where witch doctors take revenge, sirens disappear and the unseen are always at work...

programme.title: Martinique, Sainte-Lucie, Dominique
programme.desc: Three different faces of the Lesser Antilles: Martinique and its many attractions; Saint Lucia, its little English-speaking sister to the south; Dominica, celebrated by the Kalinagos... Beyond the picture postcard scenery and legendary good life, these Caribbean islands are home to a natural world that is both generous and unspoilt.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: What Comes After Love Ep5
programme.desc: A fateful love story unfolds when a Korean woman experience heart breaks with a Japanese man during her study in Japan, tries to move on but inevitably reunites with him 5 years later in Korea.

programme.title: What Comes After Love Finale
programme.desc: A fateful love story unfolds when a Korean woman experience heart breaks with a Japanese man during her study in Japan, tries to move on but inevitably reunites with him 5 years later in Korea.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: The Noisy Mansion
programme.desc: Geo-ul moves into the mysterious apartment plagued by unexplained floor noise. Determined to solve the mystery, she faces unexpected challenges while uncovering the apartment's secrets.

programme.title: Behind The Shadows
programme.desc: Yun-ho, born weak and destined to die young, is drawn to his loyal friend, Jae-un. In the conservative Joseon Dynasty, Yun-ho disguises as a girl to confess his love to Jae-un before his arranged marriage.

programme.title: Hidden Face
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiancée Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef 2
programme.desc: <The Backpacker Chef> is back! With more clients, more demanding environment and an upgraded backpack, how will Chef Paik take on challenges this time?

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 8
programme.desc: The guys pose as inhospitable hosts at a restaurant, then beg strangers to babysit their grandfathers. And it's a top-secret mission when the big loser unknowingly endures the longest punishment in Jokers' history.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 09
programme.desc: Michael is back in Chicago to hash out new ideas in a hemp store, but it's not until he inspects a spooky church that people start getting stoned, literally. Plus, Michael teams up with special guest star, Jack Black!

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 16
programme.desc: Philip risks losing a big account when he advises a superstitious client to stop allowing Will's spontaneous remarks to influence business decisions.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 17
programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 18
programme.desc: Will sneaks out with Philip's mother to a rap concert. Despite his anger, Philip realizes he must worry less about his mother's health and allow her to live life as she wants.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 19
programme.desc: Jazz fixes Will up with his beautiful sister, Janet (guest star Vivica A. Fox - "Independence Day"), who turns out to be extremely bossy.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 20
programme.desc: Will feels responsible enough to take the family car to Nevada for a concert, but when he escorts the teenage daughter of a British lord, he finds himself out of his element.

programme.title: Smallville S1 18
programme.desc: Clark seeks election as class president, hoping for the opportunity to be a normal kid.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 22
programme.desc: Gunfire erupts and it's unclear who's injured.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce – and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents – but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 22
programme.desc: Gunfire erupts and it's unclear who's injured.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Smallville S1 18
programme.desc: Clark seeks election as class president, hoping for the opportunity to be a normal kid.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 9
programme.desc: Can friends with benefits still be friends without? Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, while Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 10
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous and considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart (guest star KEVIN SUSSMAN) from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 11
programme.desc: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor (guest star LANCE BARBER), while Penny realizes that she might have been a bully herself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 12
programme.desc: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy, and it's up to Penny to teach him how to be a better boyfriend. Howard, meanwhile, must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 13
programme.desc: Everything might change when Leonard offers Penny a spur of the moment invitation to a romantic dinner for two on the 100th episode of the series.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuk’s party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo—

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuk’s party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo—

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 2
programme.desc: Much to the world's surprise, the sun releases a gigantic coronal mass ejection, as the elite task force of the dangerous secretary of defence is hot on Ranger and Whitlow's trail. They are mankind's last hope. Can they save us once more?

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

programme.title: Generation Um...
programme.desc: Three adults during a single day in New York City filled with sex, drugs, and indecision.

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

programme.title: The Peacekeeper
programme.desc: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: The Philly Kid
programme.desc: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: Kill Craft
programme.desc: Marina lives with her disabled mother and her hit man father. When he dies at work, she must take charge of the family business and take care of her mother. Marked to die, Marina must navigate the world of assassins to survive.

programme.title: The Last Champion
programme.desc: When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.

programme.title: Notorious Nick
programme.desc: Nick Newell, a one-armed MMA fighter, gets a rare chance to fight for the lightweight championship. He strives to win for himself and all the other people in the world with physical challenges.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most well guarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Fast Charlie
programme.desc: For twenty years, Charlie Swift has been a fixer and hitman for a mob boss named Stan. After a rival boss puts a hit on Stan and his crew, Charlie is the sole survivor. Charlie decides to avenge his friend.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.
